verses.text: O God, do not keep quiet: let your lips be open \w and|strong="H0623"\w* take no rest, O God.

\w For|strong="H0430"\w* see! those \w who|strong="H0410"\w* make war \w on|strong="H0430"\w* you \w are|strong="H0430"\w* out \w of|strong="H0430"\w* control; \w your|strong="H0430"\w* haters \w are|strong="H0430"\w* lifting up \w their|strong="H0410"\w* heads.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H1993"\w* wise designs \w against|strong="H8130"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* people, talking together \w against|strong="H8130"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* whom \w you|strong="H3588"\w* keep \w in|strong="H7218"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* secret place.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* said, Come, let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* put \w an|strong="H5921"\w* end \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* as \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w nation|strong="H5971"\w*; \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3289"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w* may go \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* man's memory.

\w For|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w all|strong="H5750"\w* \w come|strong="H2142"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w an|strong="H0559"\w* agreement; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H5750"\w* joined together \w against|strong="H2142"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*:
\w The|strong="H5921"\w* tents \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Edom \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Ishmaelites; Moab \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Hagarites;
Gebal \w and|strong="H0168"\w* Ammon \w and|strong="H0168"\w* Amalek; the Philistines \w and|strong="H0168"\w* the people \w of|strong="H0168"\w* Tyre;

Assur \w is|strong="H6002"\w* joined \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H3427"\w*; \w they|strong="H5983"\w* \w have|strong="H5973"\w* become \w the|strong="H5973"\w* support \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* children \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Lot. (Selah.)

Do \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w what|strong="H1571"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* did \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Midianites; \w what|strong="H1571"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* did \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Sisera \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Jabin, \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* stream \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Kishon:
\w Who|strong="H6213"\w* came \w to|strong="H4080"\w* destruction \w at|strong="H5158"\w* En-dor; \w their|strong="H1992"\w* bodies became dust \w and|strong="H4080"\w* waste.

Make \w their|strong="H1961"\w* chiefs \w like|strong="H1961"\w* Oreb \w and|strong="H1961"\w* Zeeb; \w and|strong="H1961"\w* all \w their|strong="H1961"\w* rulers \w like|strong="H1961"\w* Zebah \w and|strong="H1961"\w* Zalmunna:

\w Who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* said, Let us \w take|strong="H7896"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* heritage \w the|strong="H3605"\w* resting-place \w of|strong="H3605"\w* God.

\w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, make \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rolling dust; \w like|strong="H0834"\w* dry stems \w before|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wind.

\w As|strong="H6440"\w* fire burning \w a|strong="H7896"\w* wood, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H7896"\w* flame causing fire \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mountains,

So go after \w them|strong="H3857"\w* \w with|strong="H2022"\w* your strong wind, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* let \w them|strong="H3857"\w* be full \w of|strong="H2022"\w* fear because \w of|strong="H2022"\w* your storm.

\w Let|strong="H3651"\w* \w their|strong="H3651"\w* faces be full of shame; \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* may give honour \w to|strong="H7291"\w* \w your|strong="H7291"\w* name, O Lord.

Let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* overcome \w and|strong="H3068"\w* troubled \w for|strong="H3068"\w* ever; let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* put \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w shame|strong="H7036"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H4390"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* destruction;

\w So|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* men may see \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w only|strong="H5704"\w*, whose name is Yahweh, are Most High \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* earth.
